items.badge_description: It’s been a long week and you deserve a drink, or five. Besides, isn’t that what your check is for?
Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.
Hair of the dog? You know how to start the day off right. Have at least 5 brews before noon.

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!

beer.beer_description:
Who doesn’t like creamy
chocolate, strong coffee, fragrant spices and a bit of chilli pepper heat? We know you do, but
beware, so does the Chupacabra!

Contains barley malt, oat flakes, lactose, cocoa nibs, coffee, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla bean, Habanero peppers and hops.

Grab a huge glass, or a salad bowl, or a fancy vase, fill it up with a few of these, and have a party with our fruity Summer Punch!

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

Be careful with what you hold now in your hands. There's so much coconut jammed into this bottle that it's actually a safety hazard. Don't take your eyes off it or you might end up getting blown away by a fiery volley of Cannon Fire!

Contains barley malt, oat flakes, coconut, cocoa nibs and hops.

items.badge_description: It’s been a long week and you deserve a drink, or five. Besides, isn’t that what your check is for?
Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.
Hair of the dog? You know how to start the day off right. Have at least 5 brews before noon.

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!

beer.beer_description:
Step out of range of the lifeless broadcast of your daily routine and choose a different type of manipulation. Try our own special type of Crowd Control.
Achieve hop bliss.

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

items.badge_description: So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.

beer.beer_description:
Who doesn’t like creamy
chocolate, strong coffee, fragrant spices and a bit of chilli pepper heat? We know you do, but
beware, so does the Chupacabra!

Contains barley malt, oat flakes, lactose, cocoa nibs, coffee, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla bean, Habanero peppers and hops.

Our English "Very Special" Bitter was first brewed in accordance with an old king's secret recipe, and had an uncommon ingredient, the japanese hop Sorachi Ace. But these type of things can't really be tolerated in Great Britain, so the king soon... lost his head. We hope he at least had a Royal Execution!

Contains barley malt and hops.

items.checkin_comment: Changed my mind, this is the best beer in the world!

beer.beer_description:
Grab a huge glass, or a salad bowl, or a fancy vase, fill it up with a few of these, and have a party with our fruity Summer Punch!

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

items.checkin_comment: Probably the best beer in the world!

Achieve hop bliss.

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

items.badge_description: So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 1 year on Untappd!

user.bio: A proud member of Ego Brygghus

items.badge_description: Originally created and brewed for Russian Emperor Peter the Great, the Russian Imperial Stout has a history as rich as it’s roasty, hoppy flavor. That's 50 different beers with the style of Russian Imperial Stout! Try 5 more for Level 11!

beer.beer_description:
Grab a huge glass, or a salad bowl, or a fancy vase, fill it up with a few of these, and have a party with our fruity Summer Punch!

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

items.badge_description: Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.
Looks like you're getting around. You've enjoyed at least 25 different beers!

You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Planning on calling out tomorrow? If not, we’ll be sure to have some coffee ready for you! Drink 5 beers during the week after 10PM (to midnight).

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 25 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 2!

But these type of things can't really be tolerated in Great Britain, so the king soon... lost his head. We hope he at least had a Royal Execution!

Contains barley malt and hops.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 155 check-ins with a photo.

You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 10 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 15 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 40 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 9.
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 90 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 19.

items.badge_description: Dating back to the 18th century, porters remain an extremely popular style to this day. That is 5 different beers with the style of Porter. Try 5 more Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: Nice and light Session IPA which is really nice on a warm summer day. Pleasant smell and taste, just a hint of bitterness in the back.

items.badge_description: You like it thick and dark. Your beer! What did you think we were talking about? That’s 170 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 35.

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 50 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 11!

items.checkin_comment: Classic balanced IPA to have. Maybe some 'out of the beaten path' aroma would be a good idea, but nevertheless a good Romanian beer
